snippet.title: Final Fantasy VII - Snowboarding in Great Glacier WR
snippet.description:
This is the Great Glacier Snowboard route (Right-Left) that is used in speedruns.
It is incidentally the longest track but it puts one closest to where one needs to go afterwards.

Also, one is actually supposed to be good at this but I doubt I will ever be.
02'26''30 is my current personal best (that seems to be mildly decent)...

By the way, mashing the [START] button at the beginning allows one to skip Cloud's warm-up exercise, which saves more than 4 seconds.

Tracklist:
1) Julius Belmont's Theme (Castlevania AoS OST)
